import plotly.express as px
plt.style.use("bmh")
source.9568bf81:

source.08bf6702:
def CreatBarChart(df,title):
    data = df[df["TIME"]==2018].groupby("LOCATION")["Value"].mean().reset_index()
    loc  = data["LOCATION"]
    mean= []
    for i in loc:
        mean.append(df[df["LOCATION"]==i]["Value"].mean())
    data["Mean"] = mean
    data=data.sort_values("Mean")

    plt.figure(figsize=(14,5))
    plt.scatter(x=data["LOCATION"],y=data["Value"],marker="+",label="2018")
    plt.scatter(x=data["LOCATION"],y=data["Mean"],marker="d",label="Average")
    plt.vlines(x=data["LOCATION"],ymin=data["Value"],ymax=data["Mean"],alpha=0.99,lw=0.8)
    plt.xticks(rotation=70)
    plt.title(title,fontsize=20)
    plt.legend()
    plt.show()
source.2ae04f5c:
def CreatMapChart(df,title):
    data = df[df["TIME"]==2018].groupby("LOCATION")["Value"].mean().reset_index()
    loc  = data["LOCATION"]
    mean= []
    for i in loc:
        mean.append(df[df["LOCATION"]==i]["Value"].mean())
    data["Mean"] = mean
    
    fig = px.choropleth(data,
                   locations="LOCATION",
                   color="Mean",
                    color_continuous_scale="Reds_r",
                       title=title)
    fig.update_geos(fitbounds="locations", visible=False)
    return fig.show()

df = pd.DataFrame()
df["LOCATION"] = df2["LOCATION"].unique()

Mathematics = []
for i in df["LOCATION"]:
    Mathematics.append(df0[df0["LOCATION"]==i]["Value"].mean())
df["Mathematics"]=Mathematics 

Reading = []
for i in df["LOCATION"]:
    Reading.append(df1[df1["LOCATION"]==i]["Value"].mean())
df["Reading"]=Reading 

Science = []
for i in df["LOCATION"]:
    Science.append(df2[df2["LOCATION"]==i]["Value"].mean())
df["Science"]=Science

df.groupby(["Cluster"])["Reading"].mean().plot(kind="line", color="tab:blue", label="Reading", marker="s")
